product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Custom Travel Bottle Set
long_description: Breeze through airport security lines and keep your travel necessities organized with the Eagle Creek Pack-It Custom bottle set. Kit meets all U.S. Transportation Security Administration requirements for carry-on liquids and gels. Store your shampoos, conditioners, lotions and soaps in the four 3-oz. plastic containers. Customize each bottle to its contents with 1 of 6 interchangeable lids; kit includes 2 pop tops, 2 flip tops, 1 spray top and 1 pump top. Kit also includes 2 pill cases and a toothbrush holder. 1 qt., clear, zippered pouch prevents leaks and lets airline screeners see the contents.
short_description: Breeze through airport security lines and keep your travel necessities organized with the Eagle Creek Pack-It Custom bottle set.
